mapper.select: SELECT ba.id, ba.bill_id, ba.node_status status, ba.node_name, ba.task_node_key, ba.opinion, ba.dateline, ba.sort, ba.creation_time create_time, ba.user_code, ba.action, ba.node_approver_id, ba.task_id, ba.last_task_id, ba.source_user_code, ba.task_type, ba.transfer_id, ba.last_node_key, ba1.user_code targetUserCode, ba1.task_type targetTaskType FROM bill_task ba LEFT JOIN bill_task ba1 ON ba1.source_task_id = ba.id WHERE ba.bill_id = #{billId} AND ba.node_status != 7 AND ba.is_deleted = 0 ORDER BY ba.sort DESC

SELECT id, bill_id, user_code, task_id, last_task_id, process_id, node_status, node_name, dateline, sort, task_node_key, ba.source_user_code, ba.task_type, ba.transfer_id, ba.node_approver_id, ba.last_node_key FROM bill_task ba WHERE bill_id = #{billId} AND user_code = #{userCode} AND ba.is_deleted = 0 ORDER BY sort DESC

select bt.* from bill_task bt LEFT JOIN toa_bill tb on bt.bill_id = tb.id LEFT JOIN process_node_extend pne ON pne.process_id = tb.process_id and pne.node_id = bt.task_node_key where bt.is_deleted = 0 and tb.is_deleted = 0 and pne.is_deleted = 0 and pne.link_type = #{nodeType} and tb.id = #{billId} ORDER BY bt.sort DESC LIMIT 1

select pne.node_name, bt.id, ifnull(pne.select_approval, 0) select_approval from bill_task bt LEFT JOIN process_node_extend pne ON pne.node_id = bt.task_node_key WHERE pne.is_deleted = 0 and bt.is_deleted = 0 AND bt.node_status IN (2, 3, 8, 9) and bt.bill_id = #{billId} GROUP BY pne.id
